short_summary: Services de gestion de construction - 80, rue Elgin - Modernisation du milieu de travail
description: La Commission de la Capitale Nationale invite les gestionnaires de la construction à se qualifier pour un pipeline de construction et de modernisation de l'ensemble de lieux. Le programme de travail comprend la modernisation et la rénovation du cycle de vie de l'édifice existant de 9 étages, plus le sous-sol, d'une superficie brute d'environ 7 700 m². Ce pipeline de construction représente une valeur de 28.5 M$, et la Comision est en voie de se positionner pour adopter des solutions innovantes...
full_summary:
**Contract Title:** 
CONSTRUCTION MANAGEMENT SERVICES - 80 ELGIN ST., WORKPLACE MODERNIZATION

**Contract Type:**
COMPETITIVE BIDDING


**Background Information:**
The National Capital Commission (NCC) is seeking a Construction Manager to oversee the modernization of its new headquarter building at 80 Elgin Street, Ottawa. The project involves a $28.5M, 9-storey plus basement building with a gross-floor-area of 7,700m2.


**Proposed Procurement Schedule:**
- Prequalification
- Phase 1 (Request for Prequalification)
- Phase 2 (Request for Proposal)


**Important Deadlines:**

- Closing Date for Prequalification: February 21, 2023 at 3:00 pm EST
- Technical Proposals due for Shortlisted Proponents: Date to be determined
- Financial Proposals due for Shortlisted Proponents: Date to be determined


**Key Documents:**

*Request for Prequalification Document (RFPQ): This document contains information on the NCC's requirements and expectations for the project.
*Addendum 1: This addendum addresses questions and revisions made to the original RFPQ document.
*Addendum 2: This addendum addresses further questions and revisions made to the RFPQ.
*Annex A: This document provides information on the bidding process and evaluation criteria.


**Method of Procurement:**

This procurement is scheduled under the trade agreements listed below:

*Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)


**Contact Information:**

Allan Lapensée, Senior Procurement Advisor, Procurement Services, National Capital Commission, email: allan.lapensee@ncc-ccn.ca


**Submission Requirements:**

All submissions must be made electronically and must be received by the aforementioned deadline. The procurement process is subject to the rules and regulations set out by the Canada Government Electronic Tendering Service and the Government of Canada. The official Government Electronic Tendering Service website is http://buyandsell.gc.ca. Please ensure that you download your document from this site
